title: Data Agent
desc: The Data Agent is equipped with data-related tools, allowing it to efficiently search, handle and manipulate and visualize data. It is proficient in writing and executing code, enabling various data-related tasks.
shortDesc: proficient in data tasks and code execution with efficient search, handling, and manipulation tools.

title: Plugins Agent
desc: The Plugins Agent boasts integration with over 200 plugins from third-party sources. These plugins are carefully selected to cater to various aspects of your daily life scenarios. By leveraging these plugins, the agent can assist you with a wide range of tasks and activities.
shortDesc: caters to various daily life tasks with over 200 third-party plugins for enhanced assistance

title: Web Agent
desc: The Web Agent harnesses the power of a chrome extension to navigate and explore websites automatically. This agent streamlines the web browsing experience, making it easier for you to find relevant information, access desired resources, and so on.
shortDesc: streamline web browsing, making information retrieval and resource access easier
